item.title: Three.js Fundamentals
item.description: Three.js is a cross-browser Javascript API which allows for the creation and display of 3D computer graphics in a web browser built on top of WebGL, a lower level Javascript API allowing for GPU-accelerated physics and image processing locally, as part of the web page canvas.
